history.proof: intros s m0 m1 H. induction s as [| a p | s1 IHs1 s2 IHs2]. - simpl. apply I. - simpl. apply dta_app_ne_inc_0. apply H. - simpl. apply orb_incr. + apply IHs1. + apply IHs2.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.

None

forall (s : state) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lem m0 m1 -> leb (st_non_empty m0 s) (st_non_empty m1 s)

st_non_empty = fix st_non_empty (m : Map bool) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => false | @M1 _ _ p => pl_non_empty m p | @M2 _ a b => st_non_empty m a || st_non_empty m b end : Map bool -> state -> bool

lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
semantic_equiv_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), st_reconnait d ladj t s -> dta_reconnait d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)

signature.st_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, signature.st_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, signature.st_compatible_compat_def m0 -> signature.st_compatible_compat_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
signature.predta_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map state, signature.predta_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map state, signature.predta_compatible_compat_def m0 -> signature.predta_compatible_compat_def (M2 state m m0)
lattice_bounded_8 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), lattice_bounded_def_2 A m -> forall m0 : Map A, lattice_bounded_def_2 A m0 -> lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M2 A m m0)
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
leb_transitive : forall a b c : bool, leb a b -> leb b c -> leb a c
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
leb_antisymmetric : forall b c : bool, leb b c -> leb c b -> b = c
borne_0 : forall (s : state) (p : prec_list), prec_in_state s p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 s
signature.st_compat_check_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature.signature), signature.state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> signature.st_compat_check s sigma = true
signature.st_compat_check_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature.signature), signature.st_compat_check s sigma = true -> signature.state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma
andb_incr : forall b0 b1 b2 b3 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb b2 b3 -> leb (b0 && b2) (b1 && b3)
orb_incr : forall b0 b1 b2 b3 : bool, leb b0 b1 -> leb b2 b3 -> leb (b0 || b2) (b1 || b3)
dta_app_ne_aux_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool), def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne_aux d m)

```coq
intros s m0 m1 H.
induction s as [| a p | s1 IHs1 s2 IHs2].
- simpl. apply I.
- simpl. apply dta_app_ne_inc_0. exact H.
- simpl. apply orb_incr.
  + apply IHs1.
  + apply IHs2.
Qed.
```
